as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="16" value="<h1>Container Diagram for CCP</h1><p>CCP is deployed to an Auto Scaling Group of EC2 instances.<br></p>" vertex="1"><mxGeometry x="950" y="400" width="200" height="320" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="26" value="<b>AWS S3</b>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#bac8d3;strokeColor=#23445d;" parent="1" vertex="1"><mxGeometry x="980" y="642" width="120" height="60" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="27" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="116" value="<i><font color="#666666"><b>monitors metrics</b></font></i>" as="geometry"><Array as="points"><mxPoint x="860" y="167"/><mxPoint x="860" y="167"/></Array></mxGeometry></mxCell><mxCell id="147" value="<b>GenServer</b><br>Elixir Process running in memory" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#dae8fc;strokeColor=#6c8ebf;" parent="1" vertex="1"><mxGeometry x="940" y="868" width="120" height="57" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="152" value="<i><font color="#666666"><b>publishes logs</b></font></i>" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"><mxGeometry x="500" y="570" width="110" height="20" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="158" value="<b>Application Server</b><br>[Cowboy]" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#dae8fc;strokeColor=#6c8ebf;" parent="1" vertex="1"><mxGeometry x="235" y="583" width="120" height="60" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="159" value="<i><font color="#666666"><b>proxies requests</b><br>[HTTP]<br></font></i>" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" as="points"><mxPoint x="920" y="680"/><mxPoint x="920" y="680"/></Array></mxGeometry></mxCell><mxCell id="170" value="<b>Cache Publisher</b><br>[GenServer]" div.div:
Reverse Proxy
[Apache]
Provides SSL termination/authorisation by mutual TLS
